passage_text: Vanna White's Salary. 1. Vanna White's salary arrangement has not been made public but as of October 2010 her Wheel of Fortune host salary has been estimated at $4 million per year, according to Celebrity Net Worth.

Vanna White net worth and salary: Vanna White is an American television personality best known as the hostess and puzzle-board turner of Wheel of Fortune who has a net worth of $30 million dollars. Vanna White was born Vanna Marie Rosich on February 18, 1957 in Conway, South Carolina. After her birth father abandoned the family, Vanna's mom married a man named Herbert Stackley White, Jr. Vanna soon adopted Herbert's last name and was forever known as the now famous Vanna White.

About Vanna White. Best recognized as the hostess of Wheel of Fortune, Vanna White is an American film actress and TV personality with an estimated net worth of $15 million as of 2012. Vanna White debuted as a TV personality in one episode of The Price of Right on June 20, 1980.
